attributes.action: ensure that British programs such as Hustle (BBC) are aired in the UK before being aired in other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has recently come to my attention that one of my favourite British shows Hustle, is having its fourth series aired in the USA before being shown here, in the UK. Now I don't mind seeing American programs in the UK a few months after they're shown across the pond. But British programs, made in Britain, by a British organisation? It's insanity. Do something about it please Tony!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
